title: Land in Nawala,koswatta
details:
Land in nawala,koswatta,cooray mawatha.,high residential area suitable for commercial (can build a office building) & residential..for quick sale,price only for land value, price can be negotiable.

550m to Nawala koswatta junction
450m to Gateway college
1.5km to Rajagiriya junction
1.3km to Nawala junction
